title: Beautiful 3Bed 2Bath Condo for Rent
description:
Stunning and spacious condo with bright, natural light and high ceilings. This recently renovated unit has an open-floor plan complete with hard wood floors, ample closet space, custom lights with built-in dimmers, state-of-the-art, energy efficient appliances, a private garage and driveway, and an individual laundry room.
The main floor includes a (1) master bedroom with a large walk-in closet (2) a modern bathroom upgraded with a rain shower and custom wall to floor design, (3) a second room with a spacious closet, (3) a walk-in pantry closet, (4) a full bathroom with custom-backsplash (5) kitchen with custom-built island bar, (6) open and bright living room (7) dining nook and (8) a juliet balcony.
The 2nd floor loft acts as a third bedroom (or additional living space as you see fit), which overlooks the living room and includes an extra large walk-in closet, as well as a modern, working fireplace.
Additional Rental Amenities:
-Ample closet space, including 3 walk-ins, 5 total
-Bespoke, automatic control skylight in kitchen with sensitive motor sensor technology for weather control, includes remote
-Stainless steel appliances include energy-efficient dishwasher and refrigerator with alarm, built-in microwave, gas oven and stove-top range, motion-sensor stainless steel sink faucet with adjustable nozzle
-Oak cabinets (dark) with stainless steel knobs
-Gorgeous, wood-framed energy-efficient windows built for insulation optimization and cost-effective temperature controls
-Custom blinds for windows
-Central AC/ Gas Heat; corridor thermostat
-Backyard access
-Brand new roof, 2022
-Condo Association maintains flower-gardens, trees, bushes, & grass, snow removal, and shoveling.
Neighborhood Attractions:
Prime location in the far North East near the Deleware River, uniquely situated between Holy Family University and breath-taking Glen Foerd historic park. A short walk (less than 10 minutes) to the train station (Torresdale, Trenton Line), and about a 3 minute drive from I-95. Several top-rated NE restaurants and bars close by. Minutes to Bucks County suburbs, Neshaminy mall, Neshaminy state Park, and about a 25 minute drive to downtown Philadelphia.
Neighborhood is quiet and welcoming.
Tenant pays all utilities
No smoking in building
Application fee $50
Cats and small dogs ok
Available for rent: October 1st, 2022

title: Wow! 2 Porches+Deck -Perfect West Philly Location
description:
A gorgeous old, victorian twin, this home is in a perfect location. It's just a couple blocks away from the many shops and restaurants on the Baltimore Ave. corridor.
From the tree-lined street, you walk up onto your porch -- one that's large enough for a dining table or an outdoor sofa and chairs. From here, the front door will take you into a small mudroom before you walk into your living room where you'll find 10-foot-high ceilings, hardwood floors, and a fireplace. In the front of the living room is a giant picture window and on the side is a bay window with a built-in window seat. Walking through the living room and past the powder room, you'll head into the dining room where the hardwood floors and 10-foot-high ceilings continue. Here you'll find another bay window and a built-in glass-fronted china closet. Past the dining room is the kitchen, which includes a dishwasher and new refrigerator. The kitchen has two doors. One that leads to the basement where you'll find more storage space than you'll ever need as well as your washer and dryer. The other door leads out to your private back porch and back yard, which also has an additional deck large enough for a dining table and an outdoor living room set up.
As you head back through the kitchen and dining room and up the stairs, you'll find three bedrooms and a full bathroom on the second floor. The ceilings on this floor are also ten feet high. The primary bedroom is enormous, has a bay window overlooking the beautiful trees on 48th street. It also has a fireplace. The other two bedrooms have a slightly odd configuration (railroad): In order to access one, you have to walk through the other. (Because of this, the home would probably not be a good set up for three roommates). All bedrooms have good sized closets and two have bay windows. The unit is cooled with a central air system and has additional mini splits that can add heat or add cooling in the upstairs rooms.
The way this home is set up, it feels like you'll be living in a victorian twin that you have all to yourself. However, there is a third floor apartment that has a long-term tenant who is a lovely person. The entrance to her third-floor apartment is on the side of the house in the alley. She does not share an entrance with you and does not have use of either of the porches or the backyard.
There is plenty of street parking. 90% of the time you can find parking on your block without having to look. The other 10% of the time, it won't take you longer than 2 minutes to look for parking and you'll never have to park more than 2 blocks away.
The landlords are a lesbian couple who lived in this unit. The photos are from when we lived in the unit a year and a half ago, so the decor looks different now that tenants are living in the unit. Be aware that when you come to see the unit, it will look different than these photos because the house will have the current tenants' furniture and decor. The unit is being rented unfurnished.
In our opinion, the location is perfect. In one direction, you are two blocks away from the heart of the Baltimore corridor where you will find the Gold Standard Cafe, the Mariposa Co-Op, Vietiene Cafe, and many salons and shops. In the other direction, you are three blocks away from ReAnimator Coffee, the 48th Street Grille, and the shops on the Spruce Street Corridor. Turn in another direction and you're only 5 blocks from Clark Park, and in the final direction you're only four blocks from Dock Street Brewery. You won't find a more perfect location in West Philly.
If you are interested in seeing the unit, please respond via email. Tell us a bit about you, what your target move-in date is, and ask any questions that you have. Showings will not begin until November 8th.
Some pets may be considered with an additional fee.

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Concierge, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Whole Foods, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Glossier, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, L'Occitane, Boyds, MAC Cosmetics, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Via Locusta, Spice Finch, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Aleksandar, Alice Pizza, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a cup of coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Vibrant, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! There is so much to do in this area!
Community Features:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge desk staff

* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more!

This spacious bi-level apartment checks all of the boxes... hardwood floors, central heat/AC, gas cooking, dishwasher, in-unit laundry, outdoor space, and an incredible location! In fact, this location has a Walk Score of 98, surrounded by some of the city's best coffee shops/brunch spots (Shot Tower Coffee, Fitzwater Cafe, etc) and neighborhood favorites new and old such as Fitz on 4th, Saloon Restaurant, & Little Fish. Inside the apartment you'll enjoy the top two floors (2nd/3rd) of the building, so no one living above you. The massive living room with exposed brick walls, 1/2 bathroom, laundry, and kitchen/dining area are all located on the 2nd floor. Off of the kitchen/dining room you can enjoy the first of two decks, convenient for grilling and outdoor dining. On the top floor there is a full bathroom and 3 spacious bedrooms, all with full closets. The rear bedroom also has a sliding door which leads out to your 2nd private deck. Property is vacant and can be scheduled on short notice!
762 S 5th St

title: Center City Philadelphia Apts Near Rittenhouse Sq Be a part of history
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments Near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theÃ‚Â National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment nearÃ‚Â Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚Â Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & BoxingÃ‚Â . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media RoomÃ‚Â . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. title: 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of
description:
Available NOW: Welcome to 532 S 15th Street, #1! This 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom bi-level apartment is centrally located just of of South Street, walking distance to Center City and Rittenhouse Square. Enter on main level into the spacious living, dining, and kitchen area with lovely bay window in the front. Your modern kitchen boasts beautiful white cabinetry, ample prep space, and sleek stainless steel appliances including electric stove + oven, dishwasher, and fridge. There's a large closet for storage by the kitchen area. Continue back to your 1st bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom features a vanity, window, and separate shower with glass door. Your bedroom is sizable and bright, with a gorgeous accent wall, ceiling fan for year-round comfort, and large closet. There's a door that leads to your outside space - perfect for the warmer months! Head down the lower level to view your other bathroom and bedroom. The bathroom offers stunning floor-to-ceiling tiling, a lighted vanity, cabinet over the toilet, and a full size shower / tub combo. The 2nd bedroom features plush wall-to-wall carpeting, a ceiling fan, and good closet space. There's an additional storage area to the back, plus in-unit laundry and central a/c for added convenience. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: Located in the Graduate Hospital neighborhood, this is a hot location right around the corner from tons of restaurants, cafes and bars. You'll be steps from the Lombard-South Station for the Broad Street Line, plus surrounded by public transportation bus routes. Walkable to the Marian Anderson Recreation Center and Rittenhouse Square. Check out neighborhood hotspots like Bob & Barbara's Lounge, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, Loco Pez, Tio Flores, and tons more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional fee and monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and monthly pet rent of $30/month for dogs and $25/month for cats). There is a maximum weight of 30lbs for dogs. Tenants responsible for: upfront payments of $125 for common area electricity + $395 for water. Tenants are also required to put PECO + wifi/cable in their name. (If a longer lease is secured, prepayments will be adjusted). Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.
532 S 15th St #1

title: Massive 3 Bed 2 Bath Nyc Style Loft in the Heart of Northern Liberties
description:
Welcome to this massive 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, NYC style loft in the heart of Northern Liberties! This loft boasts over 1,850+ square feet of space in addition to the soaring 20+ feet high ceilings, with a private outdoor patio. Door to door service with the 1-car garage parking spot right outside the back door. Step inside to the open concept living and entertaining area complete with a sunken chef’s style kitchen and full breakfast bar. The large private primary bedroom on the main floor is complete with plenty of closet space. Recently renovated, you’ll love the brand new primary bathroom with glass enclosed waterfall shower and dual vanity sinks. Two flex spaces (the second living area + the sitting room) can be found in the home. One of them could absolutely be converted into a true third bedroom, nursery, or fantastic home office! The second floor loft space works perfectly as a second bedroom or living room/office area; also complete with lots of closet space and an ensuite full bathroom. This loft is complete with a full laundry room, ample closets and storage space throughout. The entrance door alone is surrounded by three deep closets - perfect for all of your storage, coat closet, pantry, and linen closet needs. Located just steps away from Jerry’s Bar, Standard Tap, Dolce Caffe, 3J’s Deli and all that N. 2nd Street has to offer! Only blocks from all of your favorite Northern Liberties & Fishtown hot spots, plus public transportation and access to all of the major highways. Schedule your showing today! **The owner is willing to enclose the second living area or sitting room to make another full bedroom if desired.**

title: Modern, Brand New 2 Bedroom Apartment
description:
Welcome to 2621 W Jefferson Street, a brand new construction 9-unit apartment building located in Brewerytown and directly across the street from the charming Athletic Square Park! Unit 4R is a spacious 2 bed, 2 bath apartment that features a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a laundry closet, as well as a large, sunny living area. The first spacious bedroom has a deep corner closet and is adjacent to another full bath with a sleek glass-enclosed shower. Across the unit, the second bedroom features its own sliding closet and an impressive en-suite bathroom with a shower/tub, classic vanity and linen closet. Additional amenities to enjoy include central air/heat, keyless unit and building entry, as well as access to an expansive shared patio and shared roof deck with 360-degree city views!
*Price reflects a 6 week credit for a 19 month lease at $1,625/month.
*Dogs under 25 lbs or 1 cat permitted. $500 non-refundable pet fee required for a cat. $1,000 non-refundable pet fee required for dogs.
*Photos of a similar unit (2R).

title: Huge, Historic Home in Prime Northern Liberties Location!
description:
Situated in the heart of the desirable Northern Liberties neighborhood, this very large 4 to 6 bedroom, 2.5 bath four-story home is full of historic charm! The kitchen features a gas range, range hood, dishwasher, refrigerator and white cabinetry. Also enjoy hardwood floors, built-in shelving, decorative mantels, a private back patio, basement area for storage, and your own washer and dryer. On the second and third floors, you will find spacious bedrooms and two additional flex rooms, giving you 6 rooms total that can serve a multitude of uses! You also will love being within walking distance to popular restaurants along N 3rd and 2nd Sts, like Abbaye, Honey’s Sit ‘N Eat, Cafe La Maude, Bourbon & Branch, Standard Tap and more! Plus, you are in close proximity to I-95 for traveling in and out of the city with ease.
*Sorry, no pets
*Tenants responsible for electric, gas, water, internet and snow removal.

description:

You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Stroll across the park and then buy baked goods at Metropolitan Bakery. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Barnes Foundation. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Gym, Yoga Studio, Sauna
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Glossier, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Veda, and Friday Saturday Sunday. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, Bluestone Lane, Di Bruno Bros., Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Le Pain Quotidien. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Relax with a mani/pedi at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Bright and sunny apartment with a Fully Enclosed Bedroom
description:
Bright and sunny apartment with a Fully Enclosed Bedroom and Oversized Windows located in the heart of the historic Old City! 315 Flats is an Elevator Building with a welcoming lobby featuring Marble Floors and an Intercom/Camera system for Additional Security. Upon entering unit 301, you're greeted by 10-foot ceilings and South-Facing Oversized Windows filling the living space with natural light. The kitchen features Stainless Steel Appliances, a built-in Microwave and Dishwasher, Granite Countertops, Modern Cabinetry, and an Island overlooking the living area. Hardwood Floors are throughout the living space and bedroom. The living room/dining room combo offers views of The historic Quaker Meeting House and plenty of room for entertaining. The Bathroom includes a Double Sink, a Tub/Shower combo, and Tiled floors. The in-unit Washer & Dryer are conveniently located in a dedicated closet. The 10-foot Ceilings and Oversized Windows continue in the spacious bedroom, which includes a Walk-In Closet and a modern shelving unit for additional storage. 315 Flats is situated in the heart of the neighborhood and steps from excellent restaurants, shops, Spruce Harbor Park, Independence Hall, Philadelphia's most historic sites, and all that Old City offers. Easy access to I-95, the Vine Street Expressway, and Ben Franklin Bridge. Schedule a private tour today! Garage parking options are located right around the corner.
315 Arch St #301

title: Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista
description:
Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista in the much sought after Meredith catchment this 2 bedroom home is snuggled inside a private gated courtyard directly across from the neighborhood favorite Cianfrani Park. As you enter into the spacious living area accented by beautiful hardwood flooring and the first of two fireplaces you're enveloped with the warm feeling of love that has filled this home. Flowing off the living room of this expanded trinity, the full eat in kitchen is contemporarily designed with a subway tiled back splash, granite countertops, a brightly lit skylight shining down from the second floor, and a unique cut out above the sink allowing for the open flow feel of this wonderful living space. The second floor features the first of two bedrooms continuing with the hardwood flow throughout, your full bathroom bright with light from your second skylight, and the perfect hallway nook accented by that same skylight that shines all the way down to the kitchen. The master bedroom on the third floor features the second fireplace as well as a lighter hard wood finish that seems to draw in all of the natural light. This along with the high slanting ceiling give this room a very open airy feel making it a truly "feel good" space. Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to be a part of a community that truly cares for each other in a home that will truly care for you.
